scenarios.name: Sarah creates her business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_sarah_uc1 name = Sarah Career Coaching slug = sarah-career-uc1 status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_sarah_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 name = Sarah Office slug = sarah-office timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create venue
scenarios.prompt: insert into venues id = ven_sarah_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 location_id = loc_sarah_uc1 name = Coaching Office slug = coaching-office setup_minutes = 5 teardown_minutes = 5

scenarios.name: Create Sarah user identity
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_sarah_uc1 email = sarah.uc1.full@example.com name = SarahChen status = active

scenarios.name: Create Sarah as resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_sarah_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 location_id = loc_sarah_uc1 type = host host_user_id = usr_sarah_uc1 name = Sarah Chen slug = sarah-chen timezone = America/Los_Angeles buffer_before_minutes = 10 buffer_after_minutes = 10 capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create service group
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_groups id = sg_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 name = Coaching Services slug = coaching-services status = active

scenarios.name: Create calendar for Sarah
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendars id = cal_sarah_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 name = Sarah Calendar timezone = America/Los_Angeles slot_duration_min = 50 slot_interval_min = 50 pre_buffer_min = 10 post_buffer_min = 10 min_advance_booking_hours = 24 max_advance_booking_days = 60 status = active

scenarios.name: Create Monday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_mon_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 calendar_id = cal_sarah_uc1 name = Monday Hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 1 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create Tuesday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_tue_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 calendar_id = cal_sarah_uc1 name = Tuesday Hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 2 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create Wednesday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_wed_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 calendar_id = cal_sarah_uc1 name = Wednesday Hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 3 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create Thursday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_thu_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 calendar_id = cal_sarah_uc1 name = Thursday Hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 4 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create Friday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_fri_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 calendar_id = cal_sarah_uc1 name = Friday Hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 5 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create offer
scenarios.prompt: insert into offers id = ofr_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 name = Career Coaching Session slug = career-coaching-session execution_mode = slot status = active is_published = true timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create offer version
scenarios.prompt: insert into offer_versions id = ov_uc1 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 offer_id = ofr_uc1 version = 1 status = published duration_mode = fixed default_duration_min = 50 min_duration_min = 50 max_duration_min = 50 base_price_minor = 15000 currency = USD

scenarios.name: Create booking order
scenarios.prompt: insert into booking_orders id = bo_uc1_001 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 offer_id = ofr_uc1 offer_version_id = ov_uc1 status = draft currency = USD total_minor = 15000 requested_start_at = 2026-02-25T14:00:00Z requested_end_at = 2026-02-25T14:50:00Z

scenarios.name: Create booking order line
scenarios.prompt: insert into booking_order_lines id = bol_uc1_001 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 booking_order_id = bo_uc1_001 line_type = offer_base label = Career Coaching quantity = 1 unit_amount_minor = 15000 line_total_minor = 15000

scenarios.name: Confirm booking
scenarios.prompt: update booking_orders set status = confirmed confirmed_start_at = 2026-02-25T14:00:00Z confirmed_end_at = 2026-02-25T14:50:00Z where id = bo_uc1_001 and biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1

scenarios.name: Create fulfillment unit
scenarios.prompt: insert into fulfillment_units id = fu_uc1_001 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 booking_order_id = bo_uc1_001 kind = service_task status = planned planned_start_at = 2026-02-25T14:00:00Z planned_end_at = 2026-02-25T14:50:00Z

scenarios.name: Add private booking note
scenarios.prompt: insert into notes id = note_uc1_001 biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1 target_type = booking_order booking_order_id = bo_uc1_001 visibility = private status = active source_type = user body = career_switch_finance_to_tech

scenarios.name: Check Sarah's bookings
scenarios.prompt: list booking_orders where biz_id = biz_sarah_uc1

scenarios.name: Get booking details
scenarios.prompt: list booking_orders where id = bo_uc1_001
